Abstract

In this post, i will show you how to use Ghost and Github pages as your static blog. mainly using following tools:

  • Ghost
  • Buster
  • Git
  • Github pages

Background

There are many tools which use Github pages as a static blog, like Hexo, Jekll etc......, due to my own reason, i like the user experience in Ghost.....

Software Versions

  • ubuntu server 18.04
  • node 8.16.1
  • Ghost source code 2.31.0
  • Python buster 0.1.3
  • Git

Get started

1st, change node version

root@1eeb91255227:~# nvm use 8.16
Now using node v8.16.1 (npm v6.4.1)

2nd, get ghost source code

root@1eeb91255227:~# wget https://github.com/TryGhost/Ghost/releases/download/2.31.1/Ghost-2.31.1.zip
--2019-09-24 07:57:20--  https://github.com/TryGhost/Ghost/releases/download/2.31.1/Ghost-2.31.1.zip
Resolving github.com (github.com)... 140.82.113.3
...
Connecting to github-production-release-asset-2e65be.s3.amazonaws.com (github-production-release-asset-2e65be.s3.amazonaws.com)|52.217.8.244|:443... connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 200 OK
Length: 3447506 (3.3M) [application/octet-stream]
Saving to: 'Ghost-2.31.1.zip'

Ghost-2.31.1.zip                             12%[==========>                                                                              ] 424.36K  21.6KB/s    eta 2m 12s

3rd, unzip the code

root@1eeb91255227:~# unzip Ghost-2.31.1.zip 
Archive:  Ghost-2.31.1.zip
   creating: content/
   creating: content/adapters/
  inflating: content/adapters/README.md
  ...

4th, install required dependencies

root@1eeb91255227:~# npm install  
[ .................] / fetchMetadata: sill pacote version manifest for express-hbs@2.1.2 fetched in 1309m

5th, start the ghost

root@1eeb91255227:~# npm start

> ghost@2.31.1 start /root
> node index

[2019-09-24 08:53:02] INFO Ghost is running in development...
[2019-09-24 08:53:02] INFO Listening on: 127.0.0.1:2368
[2019-09-24 08:53:02] INFO Url configured as: //localhost:9000/
[2019-09-24 08:53:02] INFO Ctrl+C to shut down
[2019-09-24 08:53:02] INFO Ghost boot 2.045s

now you can access the blog site in : //localhost:9000/

also you can access the admin page in : //localhost:9000/ghost/

6th, install python buster

root@1eeb91255227:~# pip install buster
Collecting buster
  Downloading https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/e1/71/aabfec0a7a00fd2db51f4b81baf389aa8878593588945bdf77f2bd9dca49/buster-0.1.3.tar.gz
Collecting GitPyt...

7th, generate the static file

# first, you need create an github repo named: your-name.github.io

# setup buster
buster setup

# generate static file
buster generate --web-url=https://minyakonga.github.io/

# deploy to your github pages
buster deploy
